text: Peter Voško (born 17 August 2000) is a Slovak footballer who plays for MFK Tatran Liptovský Mikuláš as a forward. ==Club career== ===Železiarne Podbrezová=== Voško made his professional debut for Železiarne Podbrezová against Spartak Trnava on 3 November 2018. He came on after some hour of play, replacing Endy Bernadina, when Podbrezová trailed one goal behind. Vakhtang Chanturishvili scored the goal in 90th minute, to seal Podbrezová's 0-2 defeat.SPARTAK TRNAVA VS. PODBREZOVÁ 2 - 0 03.11.2018, soccerway.com ===Tatran Liptovský Mikuláš=== On 8 February 2020, Tatran had announced a half-season loan agreement with Voško. ==References== ==External links== * FK Železiarne Podbrezová official club profile * * Futbalnet profile * Fortuna Liga profile Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Slovak footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:FK Železiarne Podbrezová players Category:FK Pohronie players Category:Partizán Bardejov players Category:MFK Tatran Liptovský Mikuláš players Category:Slovak Super Liga players Category:2. Liga (Slovakia) players
title: Peter Voško
